description: Run third_model passing date strings via argv tokens or environment variables; concatenates provided values with ':'
examples: python -m runners.third_model RUN_DATE:2025-01-01 COB_DATE:2025-01-02 START_DATE:2025-01-01 END_DATE:2025-12-31
RUN_DATE=2025-01-01 COB_DATE=2025-01-02 START_DATE=2025-01-01 END_DATE=2025-12-31 python -m runners.third_model
